request.description:
Create 30 test products in bulk. This will add products across various categories: shirts, jeans, dresses, shoes, accessories, etc.

**Note:** Make sure to set the `baseUrl` variable in Postman to your backend URL (e.g., `http://localhost:5000` or `https://yelo-backend.onrender.com`)
